data.text:
DCI is HIRING! Come join our Team for SY23-24! Available leadership and teaching positions in both Middle and High School. Share this post with your networks and complete this form! If your connection leads to a Math or Chinese hire, you will receive a $1,000 referral bonus. It’s not too late to apply and become the next #TeacherofDragons! https://lnkd.in/eDnaVdEX

We are hiring for two new senior leadership positions, Chief of Staff and Chief Academic Officer! The CoS is a leader who is able to develop and design systems and then implement them with excellence through strong people leadership. They will also assist our ED in leading our DEI initiatives across the organization. And the CAO is the leader, spokesperson, and resident expert on curriculum, instruction, accountability, assessment, pedagogy, and learning. Both require equity centered leaders that value our IB for All model! Learn more about each position at the link below! https://lnkd.in/djQHVk_a #hiring #schoolleadership #leadership #DC #charterschool #learning #chiefofstaff #chiefacademicofficer

“We’re not developing drugs in a vacuum. At Novartis we’re constantly seeking outside opinion” – Bridget Stuart, MD. Thousands of Physicians work here at Novartis, and MDs Bridget Stuart and Majd Mouded have joined forces to share their experiences of life here. In this episode they discuss the most common query they get: “What’s it like for a Physician at Novartis?” Stay tuned as next week they reveal how their work-life balance has changed. To learn more about current MD careers at Novartis connect by clicking on the link.
